entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain mixed with snow in the afternoon. Fog spreading inland. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
